title: Top of the Podium shall be accessible for Fire Engine by 7
clause_text: Top of the Podium shall be accessible for Fire Engine by 7.5 m. Ramp with gradient 1 : 10.
section: (1) Height of Building Permissible for Re-development Proposals / SRA Proposals

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
